This vignette provides an overview of the overpass package, an
R interface to the overpass OpenStreetMap API.
Documentation on the API can be found at
[wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Overpass_API](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Overpass_API)
For a wider overview of the massive crowdsouced GIS project underlying
OSM data, see [@neis2012analyzing].

Additional citations (for final vignette and paper):

- @olbricht2015data - is this open access?
- @mashhadi2015impact - nice analysis of impacts and potential uses of osm data
